*Mantella stops shooting and walks into base and sits in a chair feeling
rather bored*
----- Original Message -----
From: <Dachande85@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, July 10, 2000 2:18 PM
Subject: Neo Beast Wars


> ::Magmatron::
>
>     Finally getting back to base he went into his command chamber. He saw
> Bobertron there, but paid him no mind. Instead he went over to the console
of
> a computer and opened a glass hatch. Inside was a Red Button. He pressed
it.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> ::Destron Base::
>
>     The ship came alive at the push of the Red Button. Gears whirred and
> hissed, the outer hull guns came back online, they started shooting
whatever
> rocks they could. Many of the rocks were blasted, but a gun created a land
> slide, many fell off that way. The ship's main weapon came online once
there
> was enough room to manuver. Now the Destron Base is open on one side of
the
> mountain. (Possibilites for arial attack)
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> ::CyberShark::
>
>     He saw the changes in the Destron Base, he knew it was time, he needed
to
> get back to base to see what type of foe they are up against.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> ::Magmatron::
>
>     Pleased with his work he decided it was time for Phase Two. He opened
a
> comm  to all Maximals on the planet. His message went something like this:
>
>     "Attention all Maximals. I am Magmatron, leader of the Destrons. I am
> emploring you help in the destruction of the Predacon ship Iron Fist. I
have
> seen it's weapons up close and I know what it is capable of. If it gets
off
> this planet with enough Energon it could potentily destroy Cybertron
itself.
> I am asking you as a fellow Cybertronian to help stop this from ever
> occuring. You may ask for whatever you may need in destroying the ship,
and
> to help repair whatever damaged systems you may have, I open all my
resources
> to you."
>
>     He sent the message and went to prepare the ship in the Weapons Room.
> (Samething as Weapons locker)
>
